text: BGM
Can we start?
BGM
[Zen mode BGM]
Nice packing
This is the laptop Infinix Inbook X1slim
Yes it is slim and weightless
Charging cable
65W PD Adapter
Warranty card
User Manual
What is new in Infinix laptop?
It is there in its name itself- it is X1 slim
And it is weightless
Can we check how much exactly?
The company claims that it is 14.8 mm slim
It is really slim that if you take it to college it will appear like a book
If we check the weight it is supposed to be 1.24 but it is only 1.23
It is 10 gms less than their claim
It is OK
Design is dual tone and looks elegant
They have their branding Infinix in a very small font
BGM
Aluminium is used
It has a metal body
It comes in an assortment of 4 colors
You can buy your favourite color
You can purchase it in Flipkart only
So it is mentioned as Flipkart Unique
Intel i3 10th generation processor is used in hardware
The combination RAM is 8 GB and 512 GB SSD
Other than this you also have i5 and i7 variant too
The memory varies accordingly
I will give those details in the description
While buying ensure to look for your RAM, ROM and variant specifications
You cannot upgrade it
It is inbuilt
It is launched targeting first time laptop buyers especially students
As you can do work like documentation, project work,
PPT only in i3 configuration laptop
So for basic performance work this laptop is really good
Even if you are over working the laptop, it has a cooling system
ICE STORM 1.0 cooling system with the cooling fan is attached
It is understood that it will eliminate all the heat from the laptop
And increase the performance of the CPU
Hardware is competitive in this budget
The system is good for basic performance as they had claimed
And especially the multimedia conception was very good
As I mention multimedia conception I remember about the display
The display is 14” HD at the front with 300 nits brightness
The display quality is good
For audio quality there are 2 speakers at the bottom at the 2 sides
I don’t think it has that full volume
Now I have increased the volume to full
It will ask for copy right
As far as I have listened I think the audio could have been better it is very low
In the earlier Infinix phones you would have seen flash in the front
Even in laptop you have dual star flash near the webcam
The keyboard has backlight
Usually you do not get back light keyboard mostly in many brands for this price
A larger track pad is given
It is convenient to use
It has OS Windows 11 and for connectivity Bluetooth 5.1 and Dual band Wi-Fi is given
Looking at the ports, on the left side we have HDMI port,
Type A USB port,  Type C USB port, LED indication
And towards the right a Micro SD card slot, Type C port,
a 3.5mm jack and another Type A port are given
There is a Kensington lock that you can see in a lot of laptops
It is used to safeguard your laptop from theft while you use it in public
In both the Type C ports
You can charge only at your left side
Right side  you cannot charge
You can use it only for transfer of data
50Wh battery is used and you have 65 Wh fast charging support
Of course you can charge through your mobile charger too
These are the features in this laptop
My impression on this laptop is.....
If you think of Infinix they launch reasonable and cheap phones
Now they have started launching laptops too
In X1 series they have  X1, X1 pro and now X1 slim is launched
Particularly they have targeted students and office goers
who use laptop for their basic needs for their launch
They have launched it really well except for the sound
The price is quite competitive
It is under 30000 - the  i3 version
If you use any card offer you can buy it for 28000
Not only this laptop
Infinix on the whole are showing improvement without any claims
They have started improvising on their eco-system as well
Whether it be TV or mobile or TWS or now laptops
Each and every sphere they are trying their best
It’s a good sign
But the choice is yours
